title: The Ghosts of the Past
description: Terror ravages planet Beinan as the reincarnation of Lord Janus and his allies exact their revenge on house Gurun and its allies. Haunted by the loss of his parents to terrorism, it falls on Lord Knight Elendir of house Ten-Ar to solve the mystery of his father’s death and stop the ghosts of the past from killing everyone he loves. But Elendir’s youth and pain is his weakness, making him prey to the sexual manipulations of his enemies. Now it is a race against time to save the people he loves most before all hope is gone forever and Beinan falls to the blood thirsty monster his own failings helped create.The lives of billions hang in the balance in this exciting middle chapter to the Legacy of Princess Anlei Trilogy.Features six original songs including "I Shall Always Find You" and "Here Lies My Father and My Lord."
author: Laurel A. Rockefeller
